query:
-- Create a lifetime free subscription for user ID 1 (tianyuxi888@gmail.com)
-- Set it to expire in year 2099 (essentially lifetime)
INSERT INTO subscriptions (userId, plan, status, startDate, endDate, isActive, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (
  1,
  'lifetime_free',
  'active',
  NOW(),
  '2099-12-31 23:59:59',
  1,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
  plan = 'lifetime_free',
  status = 'active',
  endDate = '2099-12-31 23:59:59',
  isActive = 1,
  updatedAt = NOW();
